com.imaginea.mongodb.services
Interface CollectionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectionServiceImpl
public interface CollectionService

Defines services for performing operations like create/drop on collections inside a database present in mongo to which we are connected to. Also provides service to get list of all collections present and Statistics of a particular collection.

Since:
4 July 2011
Author:
Rachit Mittal

Method Summary
 String deleteCollection(String dbName, String collectionName)
          Deletes a collection inside a database in mongo to which user is connected to.
 Set<String> getCollList(String dbName)
          Gets the list of collections present in a database in mongo to which user is connected to.
 org.json.JSONArray getCollStats(String dbName, String collectionName)
          Get Statistics of a collection inside a database in mongo to which user is connected to.
 String insertCollection(String dbName, String collectionName, boolean capped, int size, int maxDocs)
          Creates a collection inside a database in mongo to which user is connected to.
 

Method Detail

getCollList

Set<String> getCollList(String dbName)
                        throws ValidationException,
                               DatabaseException,
                               CollectionException
Gets the list of collections present in a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of database
Returns:
List of All Collections present in MongoDb
Throws:
UndefinedDatabaseException - If db is not present
EmptyDatabaseNameException - If Db Name is null
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException
CollectionException - exception while performing get list operation on collection

insertCollection

String insertCollection(String dbName,
                        String collectionName,
                        boolean capped,
                        int size,
                        int maxDocs)
                        throws DatabaseException,
                               CollectionException,
                               ValidationException
Creates a collection inside a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database in which to insert a collection
collectionName - Name of Collection to be inserted
capped - Specify if the collection is capped
size - Specify the size of collection
maxDocs - specify maximum no of documents in the collection
Returns:
Success if Insertion is successful else throw exception
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - if dbName is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - if collectionName is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - if database is not present
DuplicateCollectionException - if collection is already present
InsertCollectionException - exception while inserting collection
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException
CollectionException - throw super type of DuplicateCollectionException,InsertCollectionException

deleteCollection

String deleteCollection(String dbName,
                        String collectionName)
                        throws DatabaseException,
                               CollectionException,
                               ValidationException
Deletes a collection inside a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database in which to insert a collection
collectionName - Name of Collection to be inserted
Returns:
Success if deletion is successful else throw exception
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - if dbName is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - if collectionName is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - if database is not present
UndefinedCollectionException - if collection is not present
DeleteCollectionException - exception while deleting collection
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException
CollectionException - throw super type of UndefinedCollectionException,DeleteCollectionException

getCollStats

org.json.JSONArray getCollStats(String dbName,
                                String collectionName)
                                throws DatabaseException,
                                       CollectionException,
                                       ValidationException,
                                       org.json.JSONException
Get Statistics of a collection inside a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database in which to insert a collection
collectionName - Name of Collection to be inserted
Returns:
Array of JSON Objects each containing a key value pair in Collection Stats.
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - if dbName is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - if collectionName is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - if database is not present
UndefinedCollectionException - if collection is not present
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException
CollectionException - throw super type of UndefinedCollectionException
org.json.JSONException - JSON Exception
